title: Add contact number to restaurant information

requirements.summary: Display contact number +918638918243 in ReservationInfo component
acceptanceCriteria: The contact number +918638918243 is visible in the reservation/contact section
The phone number formatting is consistent with the existing design style
The contact information remains easily readable and accessible

file_operations.description: Add the contact number +918638918243 to the contact information card. Include the phone number alongside existing contact details (phone/email), maintaining the moonlit elegance theme with golden accents on navy background. Ensure the phone number is formatted consistently with the existing design style and remains easily readable.
